subject: World Cup (Skiing)
Skiing
lead_paragraph: Mario Matt of Austria won the inaugural men’s World Cup slalom in Zagreb, Croatia, putting a damper on the homecoming of Ivica Kostelic, who learned to ski on the Sljeme hill outside Zagreb.Kostelic was only three-hundredths of a second behind Matt after the first run and had his family among the 20,000 spectators. He took the lead after his second run even though he made a few mistakes on the long, icy course. But on his second run, Matt navigated the 69 gates without a major error to finish with an aggregate time of 1:51.36. It was Matt’s third victory of the season.
